thread.title: BP Names Oil Industry Veteran Helge Lund as Chairman

author: Carlo Martuscelli
title: BP Names Oil Industry Veteran Helge Lund as Chairman
text:
BP PLC has appointed energy veteran Helge Lund as its next chairman, as the oil giant tries to put the Deepwater Horizon disaster to bed while dealing with a fast-changing industry.
The company on Thursday said Mr. Lund would join the board as chairman-designate and a nonexecutive director on Sept. 1 before taking up the chairman role at the start of the new year.
